text: America's Morning Headquarters, often called AMHQ, is a morning television program on The Weather Channel. It was formerly named Your Weather Today and Morning Rush. AMHQ airs live from Atlanta, Georgia from 6 a.m. to 1 p.m. Eastern Time on weekdays and 6 to 9 a.m. on weekends, The show gives current weather information for Americans. A weekend edition, called AMHQ Weekend, was started on January 31, 2015. title: America's Morning Headquarters
